About me

Hey there!
I'm Vishwajeet Bhagyawant, a 3rd year undergraduate in Material Science at IIT Bombay. Currently, I am staying at my house in Nashik city, India.
My passion for Robotics fuels me for doing a variety of projects. From building a Bluetooth controlled robot in my freshie year to Autonomous drones and vehicles, each project has taught me to improve myself both skill-wise and personally, and I am looking forward to improving more!!
